page.title: 07SCOUT HEADQUARTERS
page.content: THE SCOUT HQ. IS ON THE RECREATION GROUN OFF SANDBROOK ROAD. IT WAS BUILT ABOUT 16 YEARS AGO.CUBS, SCOUTS, GUIDES, BEAVERS AND VENTURES ALL MEET HERE.THE FIRST SOUTHPORT SCOUTS MEET MONDATS, WEDNESDAYS AND FRIDAYS AND ARE NAMED AFTER THE FAMOUS EXPLORERS SCOTT, MALLORY AND DRAKE.THE CUBS MEET ON THE SAME NIGHT AND ARE NAMED AFTER INDIAN TRIBES.THE VENTURE UNIT AND THE GUIDES MEET ON THURSDAYS. THE SCOUT HUT IS SUFFERING FROM SUBSIDENCE AND WILL HAVE TO BE REPLACED. IT HAS A KITCHEN, STORE ROOM, LEADERS ROOM, COMMITEE ROOM, TOILETS AND A HALL. A PLAY GROUP USE THE HALL ONE MORNING A WEEK.
